39

Security Good morning sir.

Jim Hello, I have an appointment at Whitley's.

Security Do you want the factory or the offices?

Jim The offices.

Security Well, you go along this road and turn right. Go past the factory to the offices, but don't park there. Look for the car park sign and drive down below the offices and go into the car park there.

Jim That's great. Thanks a lot.
